Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Export - Download Project Coordination Issues
Actions.Description: Downloads coordination issues to a file specified by the export format.

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue File - Show Coordination Issue File
Actions.Description: Get a single Coordination Issue File item

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Change History - Get Change History
Actions.Description: This endpoint returns the change history for the specified Coordination Issue. The change history is sorted by most recent first.

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Counts - Show Grouped Coordination Issue Counts
Actions.Description: Get the status counts for Coordination Issues in a project. The counts provide information about how the issues are distributed by location and assignee company.

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Potential Assignees - Get Potential Assignees
Actions.Description: Lists potential assignees for Coordination Issues. Users who are admin or standard users can be assigned to a Coordination Issue

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Status Totals-Show Total Status Count For Coordination Issue
Actions.Description: Get the status counts for Coordination Issues in a project.

Actions.Name: Get Coordinate Issues in Recycle Bin
Actions.Description: Lists all deleted Coordination Issues in the specified project

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Recycle Bin - Show Coordination Issue In Recycle Bin
Actions.Description: Lists all deleted Coordination Issues in the specified project

Actions.Name: Coordination Issues - Delete association
Actions.Description: Delete the association between Coordination Issue and Procore item

Actions.Name: Coordination Issues - Delete Coordination Issue
Actions.Description: Delete a Coordination Issue from the system

Actions.Name: Coordination Issues - Get Coordination Issues
Actions.Description: Lists Coordination Issues associated with the specified Project.

Actions.Name: Coordination Issues - Show Coordination Issue
Actions.Description: Return a single Coordination Issue item.

Actions.Name: Coordination Issue Sync - Sync Action For Coordinate Issues
Actions.Description: This endpoint is used to create and update a batch of CoordinationIssues. See Using Sync Actions for additional information.
